entry.RedBlue: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
entry.Yellow: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for objects in its way.
entry.Gold: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings.
entry.Silver: Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles.
entry.Crystal: During the day, it gathers with others and hangs from the ceilings of old buildings and caves.
entry.Ruby: ZUBAT remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
entry.Sapphire: ZUBAT avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.
entry.FireRed: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echo location to flit about in darkness.
entry.LeafGreen: It forms colonies in perpetually dark  places and uses ultrasonic waves to   identify and approach targets.
entry.Emerald: While living in pitch-black caverns, their eyes gradually grew shut and deprived them of vision. They use ultrasonic waves to detect obstacles.
entry.Diamond: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
entry.Pearl: Disliking sunlight, it sleeps deep in forests and caves until sundown.
entry.Platinum: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.
entry.HeartGold: While flying, it constantly emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings.
entry.SoulSilver: Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles.
entry.BlackWhite: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.
entry.Black 2White 2: It does not need eyes, because it emits ultrasonic waves to check its surroundings while it flies.
entry.X: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
entry.Y: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echolocation to flit about in darkness.
entry.Omega Ruby: Zubat remains quietly unmoving in a dark spot during the bright daylight hours. It does so because prolonged exposure to the sun causes its body to become slightly burned.
entry.Alpha Sapphire: Zubat avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.
entry.Sun: It sleeps in caves during the day. It has no eyes, so to check its surroundings while flying, it emits ultrasonic waves.
entry.Moon: When exposed to sunlight, they suffer burns. The frequency of their ultrasonic waves can differ slightly from colony to colony.
